mapper.insert: -- 杨老板组数据库字段使用的是驼峰命名，如果我们不适用这种命名方法，相应位置需要改动 insert into servicer(phone, password, state, avator, email, nickName, realName, servicerPhone, totalOnlineTime, onlineTimeBegin, onlineTimeEnd, sessionCount, msgCount, serviceGroup, serviceRole) values(#{phone}, #{password}, #{state}, #{avator}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{realName}, #{servicerPhone}, #{totalOnlineTime}, #{onlineTimeBegin}, #{onlineTimeEnd}, #{sessionCount}, #{msgCount}, #{serviceGroup}, #{serviceRole})
mapper.update: -- 对象的写法好像是servicer,跟函数中的参数名保持一致 update servicer set phone = #{customerService.phone}, password = #{customerService.password}, avator = #{customerService.avator}, email = #{customerService.email}, nickName = #{customerService.nickName}, realName = #{customerService.realName}, servicerPhone = #{customerService.servicerPhone}, customerServiceId = #{customerService.totalOnlineTime},--此处好像有问题 totalOnlineTime = #{customerService.totalOnlineTime}, onlineTimeBegin = #{customerService.onlineTimeBegin}, onlineTimeEnd = #{customerService.onlineTimeEnd}, sessionCount = #{customerService.sessionCount}, msgCount = #{customerService.msgCount}, serviceGroup = #{customerService.serviceGroup}, serviceRole = #{customerService.serviceRole} where customerServiceId = #{id};
